item.description:
Ladies of Meetup, this one's just for you. :-D  Come join Cindy K. for a night of fellow female fun (no boys allowed!).  This one's about party games and silly stuff.  Which means you may see a round of:

  • Balderdash
  • Taboo
  • Pictionary
  • Celebrity
  • Cranium
  • Encore

or whatever suits our fancy.  Bring your favorite game.  Doors open at 6:00pm for cocktails but with games starting at 7:00pm so no rush if you are coming straight from work.

Get ready for a super fun evening with the gals. :-)

---

About the location:
This event will be hosted at a private residence.  Address will be sent out to attendees the day before the event. There will be ample street parking.

Friendly dogs will be on the premises and will not be locked up so please be aware of that before you RSVP.

Light refreshments will be provided, but if you have a favorite drink or munchie, feel free to bring it.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Mini-Meetup: Ladies Night
